data.eml:eml: On the genus Limnocassis Spaeth, with description of two new species from South Africa (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borowiec, Lech, Sekerka, Lukáš (2015): On the genus Limnocassis Spaeth, with description of two new species from South Africa (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae). Zootaxa 3999 (2): 272-278, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.2.6
